statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_relationships;
SELECT supplier_id, interaction_date, issue_description FROM supplier_relationships WHERE resolution IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM supplier_relationships WHERE interaction_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT id, supplier_id, issue_description, resolution FROM supplier_relationships ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT interaction_date, issue_description FROM supplier_relationships WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM supplier_relationships WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(id) AS interactions_count FROM supplier_relationships GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING interactions_count > 5 ORDER BY interactions_count DESC;

SELECT supplier_id, interaction_date, interaction_time, resolution FROM supplier_relationships WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%' OR resolution IS NOT NULL ORDER BY interaction_date, interaction_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM supplier_relationships WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id FROM supplier_relationships ORDER BY supplier_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM supplier_interactions;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM supplier_interactions WHERE supplier_id = 123;
SELECT interaction_id, supplier_id, interaction_date FROM supplier_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT issue_id, issue_date, issue_type, resolution_status FROM supplier_issues WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT issue_type, COUNT(issue_id) AS total_issues FROM supplier_issues GROUP BY issue_type ORDER BY total_issues DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_issues WHERE issue_type = 'Quality' ORDER BY issue_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM supplier_interactions GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), issue_date)) AS avg_days_to_resolve FROM supplier_issues GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY avg_days_to_resolve ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(LENGTH(issue_description)) AS total_chars_description FROM supplier_issues GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY total_chars_description DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM supplier_interactions GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, issue_description FROM suppliers JOIN interactions ON suppliers.supplier_id = interactions.supplier_id JOIN issues ON interactions.interaction_id = issues.interaction_id WHERE issue_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM suppliers JOIN interactions ON suppliers.supplier_id = interactions.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM issues WHERE issue_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, interaction_date, interaction_description, issue_description FROM suppliers JOIN interactions ON suppliers.supplier_id = interactions.supplier_id JOIN issues ON interactions.interaction_id = issues.interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_interactions WHERE supplier_id = 101;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_info ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM supplier_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT issue_description, resolution_status FROM issues_tracking WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT * FROM supplier_interactions WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM supplier_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_info.supplier_name, supplier_interactions.interaction_date FROM supplier_info INNER JOIN supplier_interactions ON supplier_info.supplier_id = supplier_interactions.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, interaction_date FROM supplier_info LEFT JOIN supplier_interactions ON supplier_info.supplier_id = supplier_interactions.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT issue_description, issue_status FROM issues WHERE issue_status = 'Open';
SELECT supplier_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN interactions i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location='New York'
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT interactions.interaction_type, resolutions.resolution_details FROM interactions INNER JOIN resolutions ON interactions.interaction_id = resolutions.issue_id
SELECT * FROM issues LEFT JOIN resolutions ON issues.issue_id = resolutions.issue_id WHERE issues.issue_status='Open'
SELECT supplier_name, interaction_date FROM suppliers JOIN interactions ON suppliers.supplier_id = interactions.supplier_id ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
